item.description:
** NOTE: Please join us for this Jan. 28th Meetup only if you're already participating in the current cycle of chapters -- we'll get a chance to review, visit, chat, & wrap up.
** Otherwise please join us for the NEW MEETUP GROUP START February 4th at the 263 Gallery -- See you then!

To all group members, whether continuing or new -- please check out our poll HERE so we can assess the group's needs as we begin our new cycle!

We decided it would be best to wait until NEXT Thursday February 4 2010 to meet for our renewed group that would start with an introductory session. This will allow us to meet in the Gallery, which is not available this week. Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused! But hopefully this will give us all a good fresh start in the space where we will be meeting regularly.
item.name: Artists Way Cambridge Meetup
